question: Who is Akua Kuenyehia?
option1: A Nigerian lawyer who served as judge of the International Criminal Court (ICC)
option2: A South African lawyer who served as judge of the International Criminal Court (ICC)
option3: A Kenyan lawyer who served as judge of the International Criminal Court (ICC)
option4: A Ghanaian lawyer who served as judge of the International Criminal Court (ICC)
answer: A Ghanaian lawyer who served as judge of the International Criminal Court (ICC)
explanation: Akua Kuenyehia is a Ghanaian lawyer who served as judge of the International Criminal Court (ICC) from 2003 to 2015. She also served as First Vice-President of the Court. She was one of the only three female African judges at the ICC.
